attributes.action: mandate that airlines abolish fuel surcharges and include it in the price tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The famous YQ surcharge on your airline ticket is a part of the airlines costs that is being offset to clients who purchase tickets and are charged to clients who use airmiles. This is a part of their costs and shouldn't even be separately quoted. They have turned 'free tickets' into 'revenue tickets'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
